TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit Semaphore extends System.Threading.WaitHandle
Public NotInheritable Class Semaphore Inherits WaitHandle
public ref class Semaphore sealed : System::Threading::WaitHandle

summary.span: Limits the number of threads that can access a resource or pool of resources concurrently.

span.span: Limits the number of threads that can access a resource or pool of resources concurrently.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用类来控制对资源的池的访问。Use the class to control access to a pool of resources. 线程进入信号量，通过调用方法，继承自类，并通过调用释放信号量方法。Threads enter the semaphore by calling the method, which is inherited from the class, and release the semaphore by calling the method. 上一个信号量计数会递减每当一个线程进入信号量，和一个线程释放信号量时，会增加的时。The count on a semaphore is decremented each time a thread enters the semaphore, and incremented when a thread releases the semaphore. 当计数为零时，其他线程释放信号量一直进行阻止后续请求。When the count is zero, subsequent requests block until other threads release the semaphore. 如果所有线程都已都释放信号量，计数是最大值时指定创建信号量。When all threads have released the semaphore, the count is at the maximum value specified when the semaphore was created. 没有任何有保证的顺序，如先进先出或后进先出，在其中受阻的线程进入信号量。There is no guaranteed order, such as FIFO or LIFO, in which blocked threads enter the semaphore. 线程可以输入信号量多次，通过调用方法重复。A thread can enter the semaphore multiple times, by calling the method repeatedly. 若要释放某些或所有这些项，可以调用线程的无参数多个倍，或它可以调用的方法重载方法重载来指定要释放的项数。To release some or all of these entries, the thread can call the parameterless method overload multiple times, or it can call the method overload that specifies the number of entries to be released. 类不会强制在调用线程标识或。The class does not enforce thread identity on calls to or . 它是程序员有责任确保线程不要释放信号量次数过多。It is the programmer's responsibility to ensure that threads do not release the semaphore too many times. 例如，假定信号量的最大计数为 2 并且线程 A 和线程 B 都进入了该信号量。For example, suppose a semaphore has a maximum count of two, and that thread A and thread B both enter the semaphore. 如果线程 B 中的编程错误导致它调用两次，这两个调用成功。If a programming error in thread B causes it to call twice, both calls succeed. 信号灯计数已满，当线程 A 最终调用 时， 抛出。The count on the semaphore is full, and when thread A eventually calls , a is thrown. 信号量有两种类型： 本地信号量和已命名的系统信号量。Semaphores are of two types: local semaphores and named system semaphores. 如果你创建对象使用构造函数接受一个名称，它是与该名称的操作系统信号关联。If you create a object using a constructor that accepts a name, it is associated with an operating-system semaphore of that name. 已命名的系统信号量可以看到在整个操作系统，也可用于同步进程的活动。Named system semaphores are visible throughout the operating system, and can be used to synchronize the activities of processes. 你可以创建多个对象来表示同一个已命名系统信号量，并且你可以使用方法以打开一个现有的命名系统信号量。You can create multiple objects that represent the same named system semaphore, and you can use the method to open an existing named system semaphore. 仅在你的进程内存在本地信号量。A local semaphore exists only within your process. 进程中引用本地 对象的所有线程都可以使用本地 mutex。It can be used by any thread in your process that has a reference to the local object. 每个对象是单独的本地信号量。Each object is a separate local semaphore. ## Examples 下面的代码示例创建与最大计数为三个和初始计数为零的信号量。The following code example creates a semaphore with a maximum count of three and an initial count of zero. 该示例启动五个线程，阻止等待信号量。The example starts five threads, which block waiting for the semaphore. 主线程使用方法重载来增加到其最大值，允许三个线程进入信号量的信号量计数。The main thread uses the method overload to increase the semaphore count to its maximum, allowing three threads to enter the semaphore. 每个线程使用方法等待 1 秒，以模拟工作，然后调用方法重载来释放信号量。Each thread uses the method to wait for one second, to simulate work, and then calls the method overload to release the semaphore. 释放信号量时，每个时间显示前一个信号量计数。Each time the semaphore is released, the previous semaphore count is displayed. 控制台消息跟踪信号量的使用。Console messages track semaphore use. 模拟的工作间隔都稍有增加为每个线程，以使输出更易于阅读。The simulated work interval is increased slightly for each thread, to make the output easier to read. [!code-cpp[System.Threading.Semaphore2#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Threading.Semaphore2/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Threading.Semaphore2#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Threading.Semaphore2/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Threading.Semaphore2#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Threading.Semaphore2/VB/source.vb#1)]

summary.span: Initializes a new instance of the class, specifying the initial number of entries and the maximum number of concurrent entries.

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class, specifying the initial number of entries and the maximum number of concurrent entries.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此构造函数初始化未命名信号量。This constructor initializes an unnamed semaphore. 使用此类的信号量的实例的所有线程必须都具有对该实例引用。All threads that use an instance of such a semaphore must have references to the instance. 如果`initialCount`是小于`maximumCount`，效果都是相同就像调用当前线程一样(`maximumCount`减`initialCount`) 时间。If `initialCount` is less than `maximumCount`, the effect is the same as if the current thread had called (`maximumCount` minus `initialCount`) times. 如果您不想要保留任何项创建信号量的线程，使用的相同号`maximumCount`和`initialCount`。If you do not want to reserve any entries for the thread that creates the semaphore, use the same number for `maximumCount` and `initialCount`. ## Examples 下面的示例创建三个的最大计数和初始计数为零的信号量。The following example creates a semaphore with a maximum count of three and an initial count of zero. 该示例启动五个线程，阻止等待信号量。The example starts five threads, which block waiting for the semaphore. 主线程使用方法重载来增加到其最大值，允许三个线程进入信号量的信号量计数。The main thread uses the method overload to increase the semaphore count to its maximum, allowing three threads to enter the semaphore. 每个线程使用方法等待 1 秒，以模拟工作，然后调用方法重载来释放信号量。Each thread uses the method to wait for one second, to simulate work, and then calls the method overload to release the semaphore. 释放信号量时，每个时间显示前一个信号量计数。Each time the semaphore is released, the previous semaphore count is displayed. 控制台消息跟踪信号量的使用。Console messages track semaphore use. 模拟的工作间隔都稍有增加为每个线程，以使输出更易于阅读。The simulated work interval is increased slightly for each thread, to make the output easier to read. [!code-cpp[System.Threading.Semaphore2#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Threading.Semaphore2/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Threading.Semaphore2#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Threading.Semaphore2/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Threading.Semaphore2#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Threading.Semaphore2/VB/source.vb#1)]

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class, specifying the initial number of entries and the maximum number of concurrent entries, and optionally specifying the name of a system semaphore object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此构造函数初始化表示已命名的系统信号量的对象。This constructor initializes a object that represents a named system semaphore. 你可以创建多个对象来表示同一个已命名系统信号量。You can create multiple objects that represent the same named system semaphore. 如果已命名的系统信号量不存在，则使用创建它的初始计数和指定的最大计数`initialCount`和`maximumCount`。If the named system semaphore does not exist, it is created with the initial count and maximum count specified by `initialCount` and `maximumCount`. 如果已命名的系统信号量已存在，`initialCount`和`maximumCount`不使用名称，尽管无效的值仍会导致异常。If the named system semaphore already exists, `initialCount` and `maximumCount` are not used, although invalid values still cause exceptions. 如果你需要确定是否已创建了命名的系统信号量，使用构造函数重载。If you need to determine whether or not a named system semaphore was created, use the constructor overload instead. > [!IMPORTANT] > 当你使用此构造函数重载时，建议的做法是指定的相同号`initialCount`和`maximumCount`。When you use this constructor overload, the recommended practice is to specify the same number for `initialCount` and `maximumCount`. 如果`initialCount`是小于`maximumCount`，并创建了命名的系统信号量，效果都是相同就像调用当前线程一样(`maximumCount`减`initialCount`) 时间。If `initialCount` is less than `maximumCount`, and a named system semaphore is created, the effect is the same as if the current thread had called (`maximumCount` minus `initialCount`) times. 但是，使用此构造函数重载没有方法来确定是否已创建了命名的系统信号量。However, with this constructor overload there is no way to determine whether a named system semaphore was created. 如果指定`null`或为空字符串`name`，创建了本地信号量时，就像已调用构造函数重载。If you specify `null` or an empty string for `name`, a local semaphore is created, as if you had called the constructor overload. 因为命名信号量是在整个操作系统可见的它们可以用于协调跨进程边界的资源使用。Because named semaphores are visible throughout the operating system, they can be used to coordinate resource use across process boundaries. 如果你想要查找已命名的系统信号量是否存在，请使用方法。If you want to find out whether a named system semaphore exists, use the method. 方法尝试打开现有的已命名信号量，并在引发异常，如果不存在的系统信号量。The method attempts to open an existing named semaphore, and throws an exception if the system semaphore does not exist. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示了命名信号量的跨进程行为。The following code example demonstrates the cross-process behavior of a named semaphore. 该示例创建具有五个的最大计数和五个初始计数命名信号量。The example creates a named semaphore with a maximum count of five and an initial count of five. 程序调用三方法。The program makes three calls to the method. 因此，如果从两个命令窗口中运行已编译的示例，则第二个副本将阻止在第三个调用。Thus, if you run the compiled example from two command windows, the second copy will block on the third call to . 释放第一个计划，以便取消阻止第二个副本中的一个或多个条目。Release one or more entries in the first copy of the program to unblock the second. [!code-cpp[System.Threading.Semaphore.ctor named 3#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Threading.Semaphore.ctor named 3/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Threading.Semaphore.ctor named 3#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Threading.Semaphore.ctor named 3/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Threading.Semaphore.ctor named 3#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Threading.Semaphore.ctor named 3/VB/source.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此构造函数初始化表示已命名的系统信号量的对象。This constructor initializes a object that represents a named system semaphore. 你可以创建多个对象来表示同一个已命名系统信号量。You can create multiple objects that represent the same named system semaphore. 如果已命名的系统信号量不存在，则使用创建它的初始计数和指定的最大计数`initialCount`和`maximumCount`。If the named system semaphore does not exist, it is created with the initial count and maximum count specified by `initialCount` and `maximumCount`. 如果已命名的系统信号量已存在，`initialCount`和`maximumCount`不使用名称，尽管无效的值仍会导致异常。If the named system semaphore already exists, `initialCount` and `maximumCount` are not used, although invalid values still cause exceptions. 使用`createdNew`来确定是否已创建的系统信号量。Use `createdNew` to determine whether the system semaphore was created. 如果`initialCount`是小于`maximumCount`，和`createdNew`是`true`，效果都是相同就像调用当前线程一样(`maximumCount`减`initialCount`) 时间。If `initialCount` is less than `maximumCount`, and `createdNew` is `true`, the effect is the same as if the current thread had called (`maximumCount` minus `initialCount`) times. 如果指定`null`或为空字符串`name`，创建了本地信号量时，就像已调用构造函数重载。If you specify `null` or an empty string for `name`, a local semaphore is created, as if you had called the constructor overload. 在这种情况下，`createdNew`始终`true`。In this case, `createdNew` is always `true`. 因为命名信号量是在整个操作系统可见的它们可以用于协调跨进程边界的资源使用。Because named semaphores are visible throughout the operating system, they can be used to coordinate resource use across process boundaries. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示了命名信号量的跨进程行为。The following code example demonstrates the cross-process behavior of a named semaphore. 该示例创建一个最大计数为 5、 初始计数为两个名称为信号量。The example creates a named semaphore with a maximum count of five and an initial count of two. 也就是说，它保留线程的调用构造函数的三个条目。That is, it reserves three entries for the thread that calls the constructor. 如果`createNew`是`false`，程序调用三方法。If `createNew` is `false`, the program makes three calls to the method. 因此，如果从两个命令窗口中运行已编译的示例，则第二个副本将阻止在第三个调用。Thus, if you run the compiled example from two command windows, the second copy will block on the third call to . 释放第一个计划，以便取消阻止第二个副本中的一个或多个条目。Release one or more entries in the first copy of the program to unblock the second. [!code-cpp[System.Threading.Semaphore.ctor named 4#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Threading.Semaphore.ctor named 4/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Threading.Semaphore.ctor named 4#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Threading.Semaphore.ctor named 4/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Threading.Semaphore.ctor named 4#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Threading.Semaphore.ctor named 4/VB/source.vb#1)]

summary.span: Initializes a new instance of the class, specifying the initial number of entries and the maximum number of concurrent entries, optionally specifying the name of a system semaphore object, specifying a variable that receives a value indicating whether a new system semaphore was created, and specifying security access control for the system semaphore.

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class, specifying the initial number of entries and the maximum number of concurrent entries, optionally specifying the name of a system semaphore object, specifying a variable that receives a value indicating whether a new system semaphore was created, and specifying security access control for the system semaphore.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此构造函数应用于已命名的系统信号量的访问控制安全性，创建时，阻止其他代码的信号量的控制。Use this constructor to apply access control security to a named system semaphore when it is created, preventing other code from taking control of the semaphore. 此构造函数初始化表示已命名的系统信号量的对象。This constructor initializes a object that represents a named system semaphore. 你可以创建多个对象来表示同一个已命名系统信号量。You can create multiple objects that represent the same named system semaphore. 如果已命名的系统信号量不存在，它被创建具有指定的访问控制安全性。If the named system semaphore does not exist, it is created with the specified access control security. 如果存在名称为信号量，则忽略指定的访问控制安全性。If the named semaphore exists, the specified access control security is ignored. > [!NOTE] > 调用方具有对新创建的完全控制对象即使`semaphoreSecurity`拒绝或无法授予当前用户某些访问权限。The caller has full control over the newly created object even if `semaphoreSecurity` denies or fails to grant some access rights to the current user. 但是，如果当前的用户尝试获取另一个对象来表示同一命名信号量，使用构造函数或方法，Windows 应用访问控制安全性。However, if the current user attempts to get another object to represent the same named semaphore, using either a constructor or the method, Windows access control security is applied. 如果已命名的系统信号量不存在，则使用创建它的初始计数和指定的最大计数`initialCount`和`maximumCount`。If the named system semaphore does not exist, it is created with the initial count and maximum count specified by `initialCount` and `maximumCount`. 如果已命名的系统信号量已存在，`initialCount`和`maximumCount`不使用名称，尽管无效的值仍会导致异常。If the named system semaphore already exists, `initialCount` and `maximumCount` are not used, although invalid values still cause exceptions. 使用`createdNew`参数来确定的系统信号量由此构造函数。Use the `createdNew` parameter to determine whether the system semaphore was created by this constructor. 如果`initialCount`是小于`maximumCount`，和`createdNew`是`true`，效果都是相同就像调用当前线程一样(`maximumCount`减`initialCount`) 时间。If `initialCount` is less than `maximumCount`, and `createdNew` is `true`, the effect is the same as if the current thread had called (`maximumCount` minus `initialCount`) times. 如果指定`null`或为空字符串`name`，创建了本地信号量时，就像已调用构造函数重载。If you specify `null` or an empty string for `name`, a local semaphore is created, as if you had called the constructor overload. 在这种情况下，`createdNew`始终`true`。In this case, `createdNew` is always `true`. 因为命名信号量是在整个操作系统可见的它们可以用于协调跨进程边界的资源使用。Because named semaphores are visible throughout the operating system, they can be used to coordinate resource use across process boundaries. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示具有访问控制安全性的跨进程行为的名称为信号量。The following code example demonstrates the cross-process behavior of a named semaphore with access control security. 该示例使用方法重载来测试是否存在名称为信号量。The example uses the method overload to test for the existence of a named semaphore. 如果不存在信号量，创建与最大计数为 2 和将拒绝使用信号量的权限的当前用户，但授予的权限读取和更改权限信号量的访问控制安全性。If the semaphore does not exist, it is created with a maximum count of two and with access control security that denies the current user the right to use the semaphore but grants the right to read and change permissions on the semaphore. 如果从两个命令窗口中运行已编译的示例，第二个副本将在调用引发访问冲突异常方法。If you run the compiled example from two command windows, the second copy will throw an access violation exception on the call to the method. 捕获了异常，并且该示例使用方法重载，以读取和更改的权限所需的权限打开信号量。The exception is caught, and the example uses the method overload to open the semaphore with the rights needed to read and change the permissions. 更改权限后，输入并释放所需的权限打开信号量。After the permissions are changed, the semaphore is opened with the rights required to enter and release. 如果从第三个命令窗口中运行已编译的示例，它将运行使用新的权限。If you run the compiled example from a third command window, it runs using the new permissions. [!code-cpp[System.Threading.Semaphore.ctor named 5a#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Threading.Semaphore.ctor named 5a/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Threading.Semaphore.ctor named 5a#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Threading.Semaphore.ctor named 5a/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Threading.Semaphore.ctor named 5a#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Threading.Semaphore.ctor named 5a/VB/source.vb#1)]

summary.span: Gets the access control security for a named system semaphore.

span.span: Gets the access control security for a named system semaphore.

returns.span: A object that represents the access control security for the named system semaphore.

span.span: A object that represents the access control security for the named system semaphore.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法使用以下标志 （使用按位或运算组合） 的组合来搜索权限： ， ，和。The method uses the following combination of flags (combined using the bitwise OR operation) to search for permissions: , , and . 用户必须具有权限才能调用此方法，而且信号量必须使用打开权限。The user must have rights to call this method, and the semaphore must have been opened with rights. 在本地信号量，访问控制安全性是不相关。On a local semaphore, access control security is irrelevant. 如果对象不表示已命名的系统信号量，此方法返回授予任何用户对所有权限的对象。If the object does not represent a named system semaphore, this method returns a object that grants all rights to any user. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示具有访问控制安全性的跨进程行为的名称为信号量。The following code example demonstrates the cross-process behavior of a named semaphore with access control security. 该示例使用方法重载来测试是否存在名称为信号量。The example uses the method overload to test for the existence of a named semaphore. 如果不存在信号量，创建与最大计数为 2 和拒绝当前用户的权限使用信号量，但授予的权限读取和更改权限信号量的访问控制安全性。If the semaphore does not exist, it is created with a maximum count of two and with access control security that denies the current user the right to use the semaphore, but grants the right to read and change permissions on the semaphore. 如果从两个命令窗口中运行已编译的示例，第二个副本将在调用引发访问冲突异常方法。If you run the compiled example from two command windows, the second copy will throw an access violation exception on the call to the method. 捕获了异常，并且该示例使用方法重载，以读取和更改的权限所需的权限打开信号量。The exception is caught, and the example uses the method overload to open the semaphore with the rights needed to read and change the permissions. 使用获取的系统信号量的访问控制安全性方法。The access control security for the system semaphore is obtained using the method. 更改权限后，输入并释放所需的权限打开信号量。After the permissions are changed, the semaphore is opened with the rights required to enter and release. 如果从第三个命令窗口中运行已编译的示例，它将运行使用新的权限。If you run the compiled example from a third command window, it runs using the new permissions. [!code-cpp[System.Threading.Semaphore.ctor named 5a#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Threading.Semaphore.ctor named 5a/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Threading.Semaphore.ctor named 5a#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Threading.Semaphore.ctor named 5a/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Threading.Semaphore.ctor named 5a#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Threading.Semaphore.ctor named 5a/VB/source.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法尝试打开指定的命名信号量。The method tries to open the specified named semaphore. 如果不存在的系统信号量，此方法将引发异常而不是创建的系统信号量。If the system semaphore does not exist, this method throws an exception instead of creating the system semaphore. 若要创建的系统信号量时不存在，请使用之一构造函数具有`name`参数。To create the system semaphore when it does not already exist, use one of the constructors that has a `name` parameter. 多次调用此方法使用相同的值的`name`不一定返回相同对象，即使返回表示的对象相同的命名系统信号量。Multiple calls to this method that use the same value for `name` do not necessarily return the same object, even though the objects that are returned represent the same named system semaphore. 此方法重载是等效于调用方法重载并指定和权限，使用按位或运算组合在一起。This method overload is equivalent to calling the method overload and specifying and rights, combined by using the bitwise OR operation. 指定标志将允许线程进入信号量，并指定标志将允许线程调用方法。Specifying the flag allows a thread to enter the semaphore, and specifying the flag allows a thread to call the method. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示具有访问控制安全性的跨进程行为的名称为信号量。The following code example demonstrates the cross-process behavior of a named semaphore with access control security. 该示例使用方法重载来测试是否存在名称为信号量。The example uses the method overload to test for the existence of a named semaphore. 如果不存在信号量，创建与最大计数为 2 和访问控制安全性，拒绝当前用户的权限使用信号量，但该权限授予的权限读取和更改信号量的权限。If the semaphore does not exist, it is created with a maximum count of two and with access control security that denies the current user the right to use the semaphore, but which grants the right to read and change permissions on the semaphore. 如果从两个命令窗口中运行已编译的示例，第二个副本将在调用引发访问冲突异常方法重载。If you run the compiled example from two command windows, the second copy will throw an access violation exception on the call to the method overload. 捕获了异常，并且该示例使用方法重载，以读取和更改的权限所需的权限打开信号量。The exception is caught, and the example uses the method overload to open the semaphore with the rights needed to read and change the permissions. 更改权限后，输入并释放它所需的权限打开信号量。After the permissions are changed, the semaphore is opened with the rights required to enter and release it. 如果从第三个命令窗口中运行已编译的示例，它将运行使用新的权限。If you run the compiled example from a third command window, it runs using the new permissions. [!code-cpp[System.Threading.Semaphore.ctor named 5a#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Threading.Semaphore.ctor named 5a/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Threading.Semaphore.ctor named 5a#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Threading.Semaphore.ctor named 5a/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Threading.Semaphore.ctor named 5a#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Threading.Semaphore.ctor named 5a/VB/source.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks `rights`参数必须包含标志以允许线程进入信号量，与标志以允许线程调用方法。The `rights` parameter must include the flag to allow threads to enter the semaphore, and the flag to allow threads to call the method. 方法尝试打开现有的已命名信号量。The method tries to open an existing named semaphore. 如果不存在的系统信号量，此方法将引发异常而不是创建的系统信号量。If the system semaphore does not exist, this method throws an exception instead of creating the system semaphore. 若要创建的系统信号量时不存在，请使用之一构造函数具有`name`参数。To create the system semaphore when it does not already exist, use one of the constructors that has a `name` parameter. 多次调用此方法使用相同的值的`name`不一定返回相同对象，即使返回表示的对象相同的命名系统信号量。Multiple calls to this method that use the same value for `name` do not necessarily return the same object, even though the objects that are returned represent the same named system semaphore. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示具有访问控制安全性的跨进程行为的名称为信号量。The following code example demonstrates the cross-process behavior of a named semaphore with access control security. 该示例使用方法重载来测试是否存在名称为信号量。The example uses the method overload to test for the existence of a named semaphore. 如果不存在信号量，创建与最大计数为 2 和拒绝当前用户的权限使用信号量，但授予的权限读取和更改权限信号量的访问控制安全性。If the semaphore does not exist, it is created with a maximum count of two and with access control security that denies the current user the right to use the semaphore, but grants the right to read and change permissions on the semaphore. 如果从两个命令窗口中运行已编译的示例，第二个副本将在调用引发访问冲突异常方法。If you run the compiled example from two command windows, the second copy will throw an access violation exception on the call to the method. 捕获了异常，并且该示例使用方法重载，以读取和更改的权限所需的权限打开信号量。The exception is caught, and the example uses the method overload to open the semaphore with the rights needed to read and change the permissions. 更改权限后，输入并释放它所需的权限打开信号量。After the permissions are changed, the semaphore is opened with the rights required to enter and release it. 如果从第三个命令窗口中运行已编译的示例，它将运行使用新的权限。If you run the compiled example from a third command window, it runs using the new permissions. summary.span: Exits the semaphore and returns the previous count.

span.span: Exits the semaphore and returns the previous count.

returns.span: The count on the semaphore before the method was called.

span.span: The count on the semaphore before the method was called.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 线程通常使用方法进入信号量，并且它们通常使用此方法重载退出。Threads typically use the method to enter the semaphore, and they typically use this method overload to exit. 如果由引发方法，它不一定表示调用线程问题。If a is thrown by the method, it does not necessarily indicate a problem with the calling thread. 另一个线程中的编程错误可能导致该线程退出详细的时间比输入信号量。A programming error in another thread might have caused that thread to exit the semaphore more times than it entered. 如果当前对象表示已命名的系统信号量，则用户必须具有权限而且信号量必须打开与权限。If the current object represents a named system semaphore, the user must have rights and the semaphore must have been opened with rights. ## Examples 下面的代码示例创建与最大计数为三个和初始计数为零的信号量。The following code example creates a semaphore with a maximum count of three and an initial count of zero. 该示例启动五个线程，阻止等待信号量。The example starts five threads, which block waiting for the semaphore. 主线程使用方法重载来增加到其最大值，允许三个线程进入信号量的信号量计数。The main thread uses the method overload to increase the semaphore count to its maximum, allowing three threads to enter the semaphore. 每个线程使用方法等待 1 秒，以模拟工作，然后调用方法重载来释放信号量。Each thread uses the method to wait for one second, to simulate work, and then calls the method overload to release the semaphore. 释放信号量时，每个时间显示前一个信号量计数。Each time the semaphore is released, the previous semaphore count is displayed. 控制台消息跟踪信号量的使用。Console messages track semaphore use. 模拟的工作间隔都稍有增加为每个线程，以使输出更易于阅读。The simulated work interval is increased slightly for each thread, to make the output easier to read. [!code-cpp[System.Threading.Semaphore2#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Threading.Semaphore2/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Threading.Semaphore2#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Threading.Semaphore2/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Threading.Semaphore2#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Threading.Semaphore2/VB/source.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果线程已进入信号量多次，此方法重载将允许要还原的一个调用的整个信号量计数。If a thread has entered the semaphore multiple times, this method overload allows the entire semaphore count to be restored with one call. 如果由引发方法，它不一定表示调用线程问题。If a is thrown by the method, it does not necessarily indicate a problem with the calling thread. 另一个线程中的编程错误可能导致该线程退出详细的时间比输入信号量。A programming error in another thread might have caused that thread to exit the semaphore more times than it entered. 如果当前对象表示已命名的系统信号量，则用户必须具有权限而且信号量必须打开与权限。If the current object represents a named system semaphore, the user must have rights and the semaphore must have been opened with rights. ## Examples 下面的代码示例创建与最大计数为三个和初始计数为零的信号量。The following code example creates a semaphore with a maximum count of three and an initial count of zero. 该示例启动五个线程，阻止等待信号量。The example starts five threads, which block waiting for the semaphore. 主线程使用方法重载来增加到其最大值，允许三个线程进入信号量的信号量计数。The main thread uses the method overload to increase the semaphore count to its maximum, allowing three threads to enter the semaphore. 每个线程使用方法等待 1 秒，以模拟工作，然后调用方法重载来释放信号量。Each thread uses the method to wait for one second, to simulate work, and then calls the method overload to release the semaphore. 释放信号量时，每个时间显示前一个信号量计数。Each time the semaphore is released, the previous semaphore count is displayed. 控制台消息跟踪信号量的使用。Console messages track semaphore use. 模拟的工作间隔都稍有增加为每个线程，以使输出更易于阅读。The simulated work interval is increased slightly for each thread, to make the output easier to read. [!code-cpp[System.Threading.Semaphore2#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Threading.Semaphore2/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Threading.Semaphore2#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Threading.Semaphore2/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Threading.Semaphore2#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Threading.Semaphore2/VB/source.vb#1)]

summary.span: Sets the access control security for a named system semaphore.

span.span: Sets the access control security for a named system semaphore.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 你可以仅在上设置访问控制安全性表示已命名的系统信号量的对象。You can set access control security only on objects that represent named system semaphores. 用户必须具有权限才能调用此方法，而且信号量必须使用打开权限。The user must have rights to call this method, and the semaphore must have been opened with rights. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示具有访问控制安全性的跨进程行为的名称为信号量。The following code example demonstrates the cross-process behavior of a named semaphore with access control security. 该示例使用方法重载来测试是否存在名称为信号量。The example uses the method overload to test for the existence of a named semaphore. 如果不存在信号量，创建与最大计数为 2 和将拒绝使用信号量的权限的当前用户，但授予的权限读取和更改权限信号量的访问控制安全性。If the semaphore does not exist, it is created with a maximum count of two and with access control security that denies the current user the right to use the semaphore but grants the right to read and change permissions on the semaphore. 如果从两个命令窗口中运行已编译的示例，第二个副本将在调用引发访问冲突异常方法。If you run the compiled example from two command windows, the second copy will throw an access violation exception on the call to the method. 捕获了异常，并且该示例使用方法重载，以读取和更改的权限所需的权限打开信号量。The exception is caught, and the example uses the method overload to open the semaphore with the rights needed to read and change the permissions. 更改的权限，使用后方法，信号量打开输入并释放所需的权限。After the permissions are changed, using the method, the semaphore is opened with the rights required to enter and release. 如果从第三个命令窗口中运行已编译的示例，它将运行使用新的权限。If you run the compiled example from a third command window, it runs using the new permissions. [!code-cpp[System.Threading.Semaphore.ctor named 5a#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Threading.Semaphore.ctor named 5a/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Threading.Semaphore.ctor named 5a#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Threading.Semaphore.ctor named 5a/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Threading.Semaphore.ctor named 5a#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Threading.Semaphore.ctor named 5a/VB/source.vb#1)]

span.span: The user does not have rights.

exception.span: -or- The semaphore was not opened with rights.

span.span: -or- The semaphore was not opened with rights.

exception.span: The current object does not represent a named system semaphore.

span.span: The current object does not represent a named system semaphore.

summary.span: Opens a specified named semaphore, if it already exists, and returns a value that indicates whether the operation succeeded.

span.span: Opens a specified named semaphore, if it already exists, and returns a value that indicates whether the operation succeeded.

MemberSignature.Value: public static bool TryOpenExisting (string name, out System.Threading.Semaphore result);
.method public static hidebysig bool TryOpenExisting(string name, [out] class System.Threading.Semaphore& result) cil managed
Public Shared Function TryOpenExisting (name As String, ByRef result As Semaphore) As Boolean
public: static bool TryOpenExisting(System::String ^ name, [Runtime::InteropServices::Out] System::Threading::Semaphore ^ % result);
static member TryOpenExisting : string * -> bool

param.span: The name of the system semaphore to open.

param.name: result
param.span: When this method returns, contains a object that represents the named semaphore if the call succeeded, or if the call failed.

span.span: When this method returns, contains a object that represents the named semaphore if the call succeeded, or if the call failed.

summary.span: Opens the specified named semaphore, if it already exists, and returns a value that indicates whether the operation succeeded.

span.span: Opens the specified named semaphore, if it already exists, and returns a value that indicates whether the operation succeeded.

returns.span: if the named semaphore was opened successfully; otherwise, .

span.span: if the named semaphore was opened successfully; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果不存在名称为信号量，此方法不创建它。If the named semaphore does not exist, this method does not create it. 若要创建的系统信号量时不存在，请使用之一构造函数具有`name`参数。To create the system semaphore when it does not already exist, use one of the constructors that has a `name` parameter. 如果你不确定是否存在名称为信号量，请使用而不是此方法重载方法重载，信号量不存在时引发异常。If you are uncertain whether a named semaphore exists, use this method overload instead of the method overload, which throws an exception if the semaphore does not exist. 此方法重载是等效于调用方法重载并指定和权限，使用按位或运算组合在一起。This method overload is equivalent to calling the method overload and specifying and rights, combined by using the bitwise OR operation. 指定标志将允许线程进入信号量，并指定标志将允许线程调用方法。Specifying the flag allows a thread to enter the semaphore, and specifying the flag allows a thread to call the method.

span.span: is an empty string.
-or- is longer than 260 characters.
is .
A Win32 error occurred.

exception.span: The named semaphore exists, but the user does not have the security access required to use it.

span.span: The named semaphore exists, but the user does not have the security access required to use it.

.method public static hidebysig bool TryOpenExisting(string name, valuetype System.Security.AccessControl.SemaphoreRights rights, [out] class System.Threading.Semaphore& result) cil managed
Public Shared Function TryOpenExisting (name As String, rights As SemaphoreRights, ByRef result As Semaphore) As Boolean
public: static bool TryOpenExisting(System::String ^ name, System::Security::AccessControl::SemaphoreRights rights, [Runtime::InteropServices::Out] System::Threading::Semaphore ^ % result);
static member TryOpenExisting : string * System.Security.AccessControl.SemaphoreRights * -> bool

param.span: The name of the system semaphore to open.

span.span: The name of the system semaphore to open.

param.name: rights
param.span: A bitwise combination of the enumeration values that represent the desired security access.

span.span: A bitwise combination of the enumeration values that represent the desired security access.

param.name: result
param.span: When this method returns, contains a object that represents the named semaphore if the call succeeded, or if the call failed.

summary.span: Opens the specified named semaphore, if it already exists, with the desired security access, and returns a value that indicates whether the operation succeeded.

span.span: Opens the specified named semaphore, if it already exists, with the desired security access, and returns a value that indicates whether the operation succeeded.

returns.span: if the named semaphore was opened successfully; otherwise, .

span.span: if the named semaphore was opened successfully; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果不存在名称为信号量，此方法不创建它。If the named semaphore does not exist, this method does not create it. 若要创建的系统信号量时不存在，请使用之一构造函数具有`name`参数。To create the system semaphore when it does not already exist, use one of the constructors that has a `name` parameter. 如果你不确定是否存在名称为信号量，请使用而不是此方法重载方法重载，信号量不存在时引发异常。If you are uncertain whether a named semaphore exists, use this method overload instead of the method overload, which throws an exception if the semaphore does not exist. `rights`参数必须包含标志以允许线程进入信号量，与标志以允许线程调用方法。The `rights` parameter must include the flag to allow threads to enter the semaphore, and the flag to allow threads to call the method. 多次调用此方法使用相同的值的`name`不一定返回相同对象，即使返回表示的对象相同的命名系统信号量。Multiple calls to this method that use the same value for `name` do not necessarily return the same object, even though the objects that are returned represent the same named system semaphore.
